message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm afraid $100 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I can do $125, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not sure I can go that high. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
